items.name: Remedy (Sorcery)
items.description: Sorcery of Yulva, a Sealer of New Londo. Reduces poison/bleed.
items.lore: Yulva abandoned her duty to heal Blighttown’s suffering.

items.name: Artorias’ Greatsword
items.description: Greatsword of the Abysswalker. Scales with Faith/Int.
items.lore: Artorias fell to the Abyss, but his soul still resists.
items.function: Deals extra damage to Abyss creatures.

items.name: Fire Keeper Soul
items.description: Soul gnawed by infinite humanity.
items.lore: A Fire Keeper who fell into the Abyss.
items.function: Upgrades Estus Flask or gives souls.

items.name: Big Hat Logan
items.description: Sorcerer who sought Seath’s knowledge.
items.lore: His obsession drove him mad, mirroring Seath.

items.name: Seath the Scaleless
items.description: Traitor dragon granted dukedom by Gwyn.
items.lore: His envy of immortality led to madness.

items.name: Crestfallen Warrior
items.description: A broken Undead at Firelink Shrine.
items.lore: Represents the fate of those who give up.

items.name: New Londo Ruins
items.description: Drowned city that sealed the Abyss.
items.lore: Shows the gods’ extreme measures.

items.name: Chaos Servant Covenant
items.description: Servants of the Fair Lady.
items.lore: Born from love, not ambition.

items.name: Anor Londo
items.description: Last stronghold of the gods (or an illusion).
items.lore: Gwyndolin maintains its false light.
items.function: Central hub; home of Ornstein & Smough.

items.name: Bloodbite Ring
items.description: Ring that reduces bleed buildup.
items.lore: Gods feared what they created.

items.name: Priscilla’s Dagger
items.description: A curved dagger causing bleed.
items.lore: Priscilla was exiled for being half-dragon.

items.name: Quelana of Izalith
items.description: Witch who teaches advanced pyromancy.
items.lore: Survivor of the Chaos Flame disaster.

items.name: Darkmoon Blade Covenant
items.description: Gwyndolin’s covenant punishing sinners.
items.lore: Enforces the gods’ laws through vengeance.
items.function: PvP invasions; grants Darkmoon Blade miracle.

items.name: Gravelord Sword
items.description: Nito’s toxic-inflicting greatsword.
items.lore: Embodies death and decay.

items.name: Manus, Father of the Abyss
items.description: Primeval man whose humanity went wild.
items.lore: His rage birthed the Abyss.
items.function: DLC boss; key to Abyss lore.

items.name: Dusk of Oolacile
items.description: Princess kidnapped by Manus.
items.lore: Innocence lost to the Abyss.

items.name: Solaire of Astora
items.description: Warrior seeking his own sun.
items.lore: Tragic or triumphant fate based on player choice.

items.name: Velka’s Talisman
items.description: Talisman that casts miracles and sorceries.
items.lore: Velka opposes the gods’ justice.
items.function: Hybrid casting tool for Int/Faith builds.

items.name: Painted World of Ariamis
items.description: Prison for outcasts.
items.lore: Hides secrets the gods feared.

items.name: Gwyn, Lord of Cinder
items.description: Final boss; sacrificed himself.
items.lore: His linking of the Flame prolonged suffering.
items.function: Player chooses to rekindle or end the Age of Fire.

items.name: Havel's Ring
items.description: Ring named after Havel the Rock, Gwyn's old battlefield compatriot. Increases maximum equip load.
items.lore: Havel's men wore this to carry heavier armor, reflecting their resistance to magic and sorcery.
items.function: Boosts equip load by 50%, essential for heavy armor builds.

items.name: Crest Shield
items.description: Enchanted blue shield of a high-ranked Astoran knight. Greatly reduces magic damage.
items.lore: Symbolizes Astora's conflict with sorcerers; used by knights who distrusted magic.

items.name: Laurentius of the Great Swamp
items.description: Pyromancer from the Great Swamp. Teaches basic pyromancies.
items.lore: Represents the humble origins of pyromancy; his fate shows the dangers of unchecked ambition.

items.name: Sunlight Medal
items.description: Medal engraved with the Sun, awarded for co-op victories.
items.lore: Symbol of Solaire's Warriors of Sunlight covenant; represents jolly cooperation.
items.function: Covenant item for ranking up in Warriors of Sunlight.

items.name: Iron Tarkus
items.description: Legendary knight of Berenike. Wields a greatsword and tower shield.
items.lore: His corpse in Anor Londo suggests even the mightiest can fall to traps.
items.function: Summon for Iron Golem boss fight.

items.name: Witch Beatrice
items.description: Sorceress who aids against certain bosses.
items.lore: Her set implies ties to Oolacile; her death is unexplained.
items.function: Summon for Moonlight Butterfly and Four Kings.

items.name: The Abyss
items.description: Formless void born of humanity's darkness.
items.lore: Created by Manus; corrupts all it touches (Artorias, New Londo).
items.function: Game mechanic: instant death if not wearing Artorias Ring.

items.name: The Fair Lady
items.description: Daughter of the Witch of Izalith. Absorbs Blighttown's poison.
items.lore: Sacrificed herself to ease others' suffering; worshipped by Chaos Servants.

items.name: Sif, the Great Grey Wolf
items.description: Artorias' loyal wolf companion. Guards his grave.
items.lore: Fights to prevent others from sharing Artorias' fate in the Abyss.

items.name: Oolacile Township
items.description: Ruined city consumed by the Abyss.
items.lore: Its scholars awakened Manus, causing the Abyss crisis.

items.name: Undead Burg
items.description: Hollow-infested ruins near Firelink.
items.lore: Shows the Undead Curse's widespread impact.

items.name: Lautrec of Carim
items.description: Golden-armored knight who kills Fire Keepers.
items.lore: Embodies humanity's selfishness; his armor hints at Carim's cruel faith.
items.function: NPC invader; drops Favor and Protection Ring.

items.name: Chaos Flame
items.description: Corrupted flame that birthed demons.
items.lore: Result of the Witch of Izalith's failed attempt to recreate the First Flame.
items.function: Source of Chaos weapons and pyromancies.

items.name: Moonlight Greatsword
items.description: Seath's crystalline greatsword. Scales with Intelligence.
items.lore: FromSoftware staple; tied to Seath's obsession with magic.

items.name: Gravelord Nito
items.description: First of the Dead. Lord of miasma and skeletons.
items.lore: His soul was one of the original Lord Souls from the First Flame.
items.function: Boss guarding the Rite of Kindling.

items.name: The Kiln of the First Flame
items.description: Gwyn's final resting place.
items.lore: Where the Age of Fire began and ends.
items.function: Final area before the Gwyn fight.

items.name: Dark Sign
items.description: Brand of the Undead. Prevents true death.
items.lore: A curse or blessing? Tied to humanity's true nature.
items.function: Mechanic: respawn at bonfires after death.

items.name: Frampt
items.description: Primordial serpent urging the player to link the Fire.
items.lore: Possibly manipulative; serves Gwyn's agenda.
items.function: Guides players to place the Lordvessel.

items.name: Kaathe
items.description: Primordial serpent advocating for the Age of Dark.
items.lore: Reveals the truth about the Dark Soul and Undead Curse.

items.name: Darkwraith Covenant
items.description: Covenant that steals humanity via invasions.
items.lore: Serve the Abyss; oppose the gods.
items.function: PvP-focused; grants Dark Hand and Red Eye Orb.

items.name: Vagrant
items.description: Rare enemy spawned from lost items in other worlds.
items.lore: Manifestation of other players' failures.

items.name: Ingward
items.description: Last surviving Sealer of New Londo.
items.lore: Guards the key to the Abyss; knows the truth about the Flood.

items.name: Demon Firesage
items.description: Corrupted witch-turned-demon.
items.lore: One of Izalith's original witches, now a mindless beast.

items.name: Shiva of the East
items.description: Eastern merchant seeking rare weapons.
items.lore: His betrayal mirrors the world's moral decay.

items.name: Symbol of Avarice
items.description: Mimic helmet that boosts souls but drains HP.
items.lore: Literal embodiment of greed.

items.name: Crossbreed Priscilla
items.description: Half-dragon outcast in the Painted World.
items.lore: Feared for her Lifehunt ability; exiled by the gods.

items.name: Gwyndolin
items.description: Illusion-weaving son of Gwyn.
items.lore: Maintains Anor Londo's false sunlight; enforces the gods' will.
items.function: Optional boss; leader of Darkmoon Blades.

items.name: Dreg Heap
items.description: Convergence of collapsed worlds (DS3 reference).
items.lore: Shows the end result of endless Fire-linking cycles.

items.name: Humanity
items.description: Fragment of the Dark Soul. Heals and kindles bonfires.
items.lore: The true nature of humans, suppressed by Gwyn.
items.function: Restores HP, reverses Hollowing, enables multiplayer.

items.name: The Chosen Undead
items.description: Player character bearing the Darksign.
items.lore: Decides the fate of the Age of Fire.
items.function: Variable endings: Link the Fire or Dark Lord.
